title: No Ordinary Girl
description: This girl is different from any Greg has ever met before. She can fix a car, change a tire, saddle a horse and cook too. This girl is just too good to be true, but Greg isnâ€™t ready for any romance and such. His heart still hurts from the last one he loved. Can Colleen change his old cold heart and make him hers?
author: Marissa Storm
